msItem.title: Akbar-namah.
msItem.note: Folio preceding text, recto: a) Signature of Ellis dated 21.12.20. On the same and the preceding folio are comments by Henry Beveridge and Ellis on the contents and on the omissions and disarrangement of the MS. Of these the latest is on this folio: The above-mentioned disarrangement has now been rectified. A.G.E. 7.7.21. There are notes and comments related to the problems throughout the manuscript. F577b, in Ellis's hand: Luzac (Beveridge) 21.12.20. Following the text is a detailed concordance, in the hand of Ellis, of this manuscript and two lithographed editions. The third daftar, defective at the beginning and starting in the account of the eighteenth year. Lacks some chapters.
msItem.incipit: ... gardanid wa mashmul-i khaza'in-i tafaqqudat-i khusrawani

bindingDesc.p: Red leather Indian binding with stamped and painted decoration, the spine an English replacement with tooled title.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
